articles.description: Asian stocks skidded on Friday as rising U.S. Treasury yields again rattled equity investors while hoisting the dollar to a three-month high, which in turn dragged the Japanese yen to an eight-month trough.
articles.title: GLOBAL MARKETS-Rising bond yields, dollar slug Asian shares, yen - Reuters
